snippet: World number two Andy Murray was given a tough test but pushed his way past Marcel Granollers 6-4 7-6(3) in his opening match at the BNP Paribas Open in California on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: World number two Andy Murray was given a tough test but pushed his way past Marcel Granollers 6-4 7-6(3) in his opening match at the BNP Paribas Open in California on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Murray Advances, Kerber Sent Packing at Indian Wells
headline.main: Murray Advances, Kerber Sent Packing at Indian Wells
